-e ---

𓎡 𓏏 𓏏 𓅪 छोटा choṭā short குட்டை kuttai കൊച്ചു kot͡ʃt͡ʃu kurz (z=ts) 𓎡 𓅪 കുറു kuru ಚಿಕ್ಕ chikka 𓎡 𓏏 𓅪 pettiness
𓎡 𓏏 𓎡 𓏏 | little dog? | Köter कुत्ता kuttā
𓎡 𓏏 𓏏 𓆨 | cootie = louse | Kitt-Laus

cute is a wanderword meaning small/short (𓋴 𓏏 𓎡 𓈖 𓂻)
derived from the megaroot √cut

ცოტა (coṭa)
ছোট choṭo
چھوٹا choṭā
सानो qıtek
choṭā
a’kitã
קָטָן qâṭân
ܙܥܘܪܐ (zʿōrâ) short

related to cute pets (petits), especially cats and köter कुत्ता (kuttā)
კუდი (ḳudi:tail)
